snippet: A bomb blast that appeared to be targeting a provincial government minister killed 11 people before dawn on Wednesday at a soccer field in Karachi, officials said.
abstract: Bomb blast appearing to target provincial government minister Javed Naghori kills 11 people and wounds 24 others at soccer filed in Karachi, Pakistan; Naghori escapes unharmed.
lead_paragraph: A bomb blast that appeared to be targeting a provincial government minister killed 11 people before dawn on Wednesday at a soccer field in Karachi, officials said.

headline.main: Pakistan: Bomb Blast Kills 11 at Soccer Field
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Bomb Blast Kills 11 at Soccer Field
